column1: The Pit Room////Visiting Houston for the weekend and wanted some BBQ - The Pit Room deserves all the hype! When we arrived the line was out the door but moving along steadily. They offer meat plates
column4: and even frito pie! I had the frito pie with chopped brisket. Best meal of the week while visiting! Plenty of space outside for eating as well. Don't let the line fool you
column5: it moves fast and you honestly won't regret it!
